detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished thru SWATT. The test casea are based on this design, and shall also cover the configuration options.

sect1.title: Verification of Resource Consumption
sect1.para:
Esitmatied Resource consumption for component: Both sample and sammple_intensity are evalueted together.
Component
CPU Load(In percentage)
ROM(In Byte)
RAM(In Byte)
NVM(In Byte)
Stack(In Byte)
DiagnosticTimers
0.0400
800
20
0
800

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The verification of the SWDD is performed by review. The review process is part of the development process within JIRA. The review template can be found here GitHub Review

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The functions of DiagnosticTimers are tested automatically by a SWATT test. See links at the related functions under "Test Method".
